Issue summary:
Drakefire pistols dropped during loot spoils of war opening for the Dwarf. However item failed to appear in inventory afterwards, however the other two items did. 

Steps to reproduce: Unclear since it was a spoils of war box. Second spoils of war box opened gave all items like normal.
